title: My Time at Portia – v2.0.139521 + 8 DLCs
body:
My Time at Portia – v2.0.139521 + 8 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Lifestyle, Virtual world, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Pathea Games, Team17 Digital
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 5.5 GB
Repack Size: 3.1 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 11 other (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on My.Time.At.Portia.MULTi13-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-my.time.at.portia.multi13.iso (5,961,121,792 bytes)
  • Game version: v2.0.139521; 8 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 5.5 to 3.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-7 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 9 GB (~10 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Start a new life in the enchanting town of Portia! Restore your Pa’s neglected workshop to its former glory by fulfilling commissions, growing crops, raising animals, and befriending the quirky inhabitants of this charming post-apocalyptic land!

Armed with your Pa’s old handbook and workbench, you must gather, mine and craft your way to being crowned the number one workshop in Portia. Help the locals rebuild the town and uncover the secrets locked deep away beneath it. Be prepared though…it won’t be easy!

The town of Portia is full of friendly new faces for you to meet. Make friends, complete requests, exchange gifts, go on dates and let romance blossom!

Inspired by the magic of Studio Ghibli, My Time at Portia whisks you away to a world of wonder that you won’t forget. How will you spend your time at Portia?

Included DLCs

  • Kickstarter Rewards 1
  • Kickstarter Rewards 2
  • Kickstarter Rewards 3
  • Kickstarter Rewards 4
  • Kickstarter Pet Package
  • NPC’s Attire Package
  • Player’s Attire Package
  • Player’s Swimsuite Package

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous repack of this game.
